## Photothermal Model

<br><br>
<center>
**$\frac{1}{f}$ = *a* + *b*$\overline{T}$ + *c*$\overline{P}$**
</center>
<br>

- *f* = Days to flower
- $\overline{T}$ = Temperature
- $\overline{P}$ = Photoperiod
- *a b c* = Genotype specific constants

## Photothermal Model

<center>
<br>
**$\frac{1}{f}$ = *a* + *b*$\overline{T}$ + *c*$\overline{P}$**

<br>

**Thermal Model**:

$\frac{1}{f}$ = *a* + *b*$\overline{T}$

<br>

**Photoperiodic Model**:

$\frac{1}{f}$ = *a* + *c*$\overline{P}$
</center>

## Photothermal Model: Equations

<br>
**Photothermal Model**: $\frac{1}{f}$ = *a* + *b*$\overline{T}$ + *c*$\overline{P}$

<br>
**"Base Temperature"**: $T_{b}$ = -(*a* + *c*$\overline{P}$) / *b*

**thermal sum**: $T_{f}$  = $\sum_{i = 1}^{f} (T_{i} - T_{b})$ = 1 / *b*

<br>
**"Critical Photoperiod"**: $P_{c}$ = -(*a* + *b*$\overline{T}$) / *c*

**Photoperiodic Sum**: $P_{f}$ = $\sum_{i = 1}^{f} (P_{i} - P_{c})$ = 1 / *c*
